ygData.messageBody:
According to Wizard:
> I used to try to max my piercing and 2h staff until lv 8, when i lost my
> snake fang to death bug. I try it again at a 12 lv and i tryed to max it
> again. IT DONT MOVE i lost hours fighting a blue yellow and even red when
> some group leave me to try and nothing i never get any advance anymore ?? i
> also get one cracked staff but with skill 0 i never got any advance. so now
> i have 2h blunt at 36 and dagger at 20 1h blunt at 0. and i dont have any
> wish to invest a skill points in this :)

I don't really know. I hadn't used my dagger skills since level 2, when I found
a decaying skeleton carrying a worn great staff, so when I decided at level 8
to go back to dagger (skill was 4 when I stopped it), it took me three fights
before I got a message on Piercing skill. And the skill *immediately* raised to
8, which shows that your min skill is also equal to your level for combat
skills.

(so, if you're 12, investing 1 practice in 1h blunt gives you 12, not 1)

Since then, I'm switching weapons after each fight in which I gain a skill
point. Keeps me maxed correctly in all... I suspect I'll have a Crookstinger
before I get the totem staff...
